metadata.description: A collection of Claude Code plugins for AI-Native Product Teams

plugins.name: clarify
plugins.description: A skill that transforms ambiguous requirements into clear specifications

plugins.name: slack-to-md
plugins.description: A skill that converts Slack threads into Markdown

plugins.name: suggest-tidyings
plugins.description: A skill that suggests safe refactoring opportunities based on Kent Beck's Tidy First? philosophy

plugins.name: attention-hook
plugins.description: A hook that sends Slack notifications when Claude Code is waiting

plugins.name: g-export
plugins.description: A skill that downloads public Google Slides, Docs, and Sheets to local files

plugins.name: interview
plugins.description: A skill that conducts structured interviews to extract requirements, constraints, and design decisions

plugins.name: notion-to-md
plugins.description: A skill that converts public Notion pages to local Markdown files

plugins.name: retro
plugins.description: A skill that performs comprehensive session retrospectives

plugins.name: url-export
plugins.description: A unified skill that auto-detects URL types and delegates to the appropriate export skill
